name: PokemonApp
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.build:ios: cd platforms/ios && xcodebuild -workspace PokemonApp.xcworkspace -scheme PokemonApp -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,id=3CBE139C-195C-4CE6-B8CC-A7D7A4849307' build
scripts.run:ios: npm run build:ios && npm run install:ios && npm run launch:ios

author: Sacha Duvivier
